entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 806,308Chapters: 101/?Kudos: 841

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I’ve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: to the lighthouse
entry.summary:
Author: peachmiffy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,382Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 58

Summary: "Daughter of Hippolyta, Child of the Amazons. You have forsworn your sacred oath as spoken to Jason Peter Todd. I deliver your punishment: I have set loose the Hydra of Lerna upon your world. Only you are capable of slaying it, and only upon seeking atonement and rectifying your mistake shall you accomplish this goal.”   When you're sixteen, your boyfriend is killed by the Joker. When you're twenty-three, you’re cursed by the god of broken promises.

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,885Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 94

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham’s Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It’s a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn’t.

entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: bloodbythemiddleeast (laptopsocks)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,307Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 482

Summary: There’s almost something unsettling about how that moves you—how Jason’s character could be cracked open by a single Jane Austen line, buried in the pages of a book he keeps within reach. It softens him, grinds the edges of his form in your memory, sands the grit from his words in your hand, and you think this living arrangement might not be too bad after all. What’s so bad about a big man reading a little bit of Jane Austen, anyway? In which your roommate keeps arriving home bloodied and bruised, stubborn and a little cruel.

entry.title: This time I look to see what's between the lines
entry.summary:
Author: Nyxin00

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,467Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 32

Summary: You're a trouble-maker, it's in your blood. You can't help goading men twice your size into an unfair fight, knowing you always have the upper hand. There's something about seeing them go down hard, fast and with a look of shock. It makes your blood sing in your veins. Of course, the one time you get caught the court mandates anger management classes, thanks to your clear record. You'll go, if only to avoid the officer you know is chomping at the bit to kick down your door. And if you keep going for the guy you can share quiet discontent with around the coffee machine, then who's to blame you?

entry.title: Velvet Crowbar
entry.summary:
Author: VenusCrytrap

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,071Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 770

Summary: The kid next door has it rough. There’s nothing much anyone can do about it in a place like the Narrows, but you lead with as much kindness as you can afford and try to make his life a little easier. He crushes on you the way a lot of kids do on their babysitter, but he’s too young and too scrawny. He fears you’ll never take him seriously. Life tears you apart, but when the universe puts you in his path years later, Jason thinks he may finally have a shot- even though you’re both a little different. And a little worse. (Or: Jason reunites with the babysitter he had a big fat crush on)
